---
title: "Remote Sensing Packages"
---

<div id="search-container">
  <input type="text" id="package-search" placeholder="Search packages..." />
</div>

<div id="alphabet-filter" style="margin: 0.5em 0;"></div>

<div id="category-packages" data-category="remote-sensing"></div>

<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', async function() {
  const container = document.getElementById('category-packages');
  const searchInput = document.getElementById('package-search');
  const alphabetContainer = document.getElementById('alphabet-filter');

  let packages = [];
  let activeLetter = null;

  function renderPackages(list) {
    container.innerHTML = `
      <p class="results-count">Found ${list.length} packages</p>
      <div class="package-list">
        ${list.slice(0, 50).map(pkg => `
          <div class="package-card">
            <div class="package-header">
              <h3 class="package-title">
                <a href="${pkg.repository || pkg.url || '#'}" target="_blank">${pkg.package_name}</a>
              </h3>
              <span class="package-score">${pkg.score ? pkg.score.toFixed(1) : 'N/A'}</span>
            </div>
            <p class="package-description">${pkg.title || 'No description'}</p>
          </div>
        `).join('')}
      </div>
    `;
  }

  function applyFilters() {
    const query = searchInput.value.trim().toLowerCase();
    let filtered = packages;
    if (activeLetter) {
      filtered = filtered.filter(pkg => pkg.package_name.charAt(0).toUpperCase() === activeLetter);
    }
    if (query) {
      filtered = filtered.filter(pkg => pkg.package_name.toLowerCase().includes(query));
    }
    renderPackages(filtered);
  }

  try {
    const response = await fetch('../data/categories/remote-sensing.json');
    if (!response.ok) throw new Error('Failed to load packages');
    packages = await response.json();

    alphabetContainer.innerHTML = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'.split('').map(l => `<button class="letter-btn" data-letter="${l}">${l}</button>`).join('');
    renderPackages(packages);
    searchInput.addEventListener('input', applyFilters);
    alphabetContainer.querySelectorAll('.letter-btn').forEach(btn => {
      btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
        activeLetter = (activeLetter === this.dataset.letter) ? null : this.dataset.letter;
        alphabetContainer.querySelectorAll('.letter-btn').forEach(b => b.classList.toggle('active', b.dataset.letter === activeLetter));
        applyFilters();
      });
    });
  } catch (e) {
    container.innerHTML = '<p>Unable to load packages. <a href="index.html">Browse all categories</a>.</p>';
  }
});
</script>

<style>
.letter-btn { background: none; border: none; color: #666; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 500; padding: 0 4px; font-size: 0.9rem; }
.letter-btn:hover { color: #333; }
.letter-btn.active { color: #000; font-weight: 700; }
</style>
